statements: SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE total_purchases_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY first_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, total_purchases_amount FROM Customers WHERE total_purchases_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE total_purchases_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchases_amount FROM Customers WHERE first_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY total_purchases_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT last_name, first_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, registration_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, amount_spent FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, amount_spent, email FROM customers ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE amount_spent > 1000 ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000 ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC, customers.customer_name ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, transactions.amount, customer_segments.segment_name FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id WHERE transactions.amount > 500 ORDER BY transactions.amount DESC, customer_segments.segment_name ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, customer_segments.segment_name, customer_segments.description FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id WHERE customer_segments.segment_name = 'Premium' ORDER BY customers.customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, amount_paid FROM products p JOIN transactions t ON p.product_id = t.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_id;

SELECT products.product_name, transactions.quantity, transactions.amount_paid FROM products JOIN transactions ON products.product_id = transactions.product_id WHERE transactions.amount_paid > 100 ORDER BY transactions.amount_paid DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.name, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customers.age < 40 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT customers.name, COUNT(orders.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM Customer_Segments WHERE segment_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Feedback' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM Customer_Segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
